Headline: #36 Broadway and #62 Archer Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Randolph
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway and 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Staste, Wacker, Clark and Washington: due to, street blockage near  State/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Cottage Grove and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
